titleNullable: Elon Musk Tweets Sentiment(Classified via RoBERTa)
descriptionNullable: This dataset was compiled by scraping Twitter for tweets from the @elonmusk account. In addition, feature engineering has occurred on the dataset to add a field called 'sentiment' and 'mentions, for further analysis. The sentiment column was generated by using a RoBERTa Transformers Model, which can be found here (https://huggingface.co/cardiffnlp/twitter-roberta-base-sentiment). This dataset can be used to show time series analysis of @elonmusk tweets, can be used for other forms of data analysis, text analysis, sentiment analysis, and other various forms of NLP. **Update: Newly added files will be added with the most recent refresh date listed in the file name, current update is as of 12-25-22**
title: Elon Musk Tweets Sentiment(Classified via RoBERTa)
subtitle: Elon Musk Historical Twitter Data
